duties_responsibilities.duty: Verify, clean, and update large award datasets for effective implementation of federal discretionary grant monitoring project.
Conduct descriptive and longitudinal analyses of data using various tools and methods.
Develop data visualizations and dashboards, and contribute to project deliverables by writing reports and presenting findings to stakeholders.
Oversee data merging, storage, and security protocols to ensure compliance with data sharing agreements and security policies.
Synthesize information from multiple sources, conduct quantitative and qualitative analysis, and author sections of reports and proposals.
Participate in the development of proposals for new work and contribute to resource development.

education_certification.credential: Masters or PhD in educational research or evaluation, or related field
